entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
